metadata.title: CVE-2016-3674 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Multiple XML external entity (XXE) vulnerabilities in the (1) Dom4JDriver, (2) DomDriver, (3) JDomDriver, (4) JDom2Driver, (5) SjsxpDriver, (6) StandardStaxDriver, and (7) WstxDriver drivers in XStream before 1.4.9 allow remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a crafted XML document.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-3674` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxstream-java - 1.4.9-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxstream-java package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.9-1').
